activities: Unique Software Solutions, Inc. is a software development corporation that focuses on database development for the Occupational Health, Safety & Environmental market.  Our product is used by our customers to track data such, safety data, medical testing data, and environmental data to provide the customer with a tracking system for OSHA reporting, corporate required reporting as well as statistical analysis.    USSI provides this database in versions for Client Server, Web, and as an ASP service on our secure servers.  To compliment our software, USSI also provides technical support, training and consultation on our products usage.
eucountries: Czech Republic, France, Lithuania, Poland, Portugal, United Kingdom
